## Profile

Deputy Director, Center for Biotechnology Research,
Senior Lecturer, Department of Human Physiology, Bayero University Kano, Nigeria.

Visiting Senior Lecturer, Umaru Musa Yar'adua University Katsina State, Nigeria.

Research Associate, Kano Independent Research Center Trust (KIRCT)

Full Member and Society Representative, The Physiological Society (UK)

**Role:** Teaching and Research 

**Teaching Focus:** Training Medical, Allied Health Sciences and core Physiology and Anatomy students.

**Research Focus:** Investigating population specific mutations associated with cardiovascular and other diseases of public health concern

## Current Research Projects
Investigating genetic predisposition to preeclampsia in Northern Nigeria

Population Specific Mutations linked to familial hypercholesterolemia.
